textBox.richText: Here are some .pdf documents I’ve made and collected for organizing the start of my world history class each year. Please leave the author’s name on items if you use them. If you find something especially useful, or are looking for a particular item, please let me know. Downloads - Here are the ones I have added today: Ten Commandments of History Writing - Schlabach Essay Rubric - Student’s Friend Letter of Introduction for 10th Grade World History Classes World History Syllabus Partner Syllabus Quiz Specific Sub Plans General Sub Information Unit Variety Checklist Interactive Notebook Information Class Policies Year Plan for 10th Grade World History Unit 1 Outline for 10th Grade World History Honors World History Option
